Discovering wonder /
uncovering glory

We're a husband (Nate) and wife (Mo) duo who try to tear through the blinders of the mundane through the power of story and illustration.
/ BOOK
Our first printed work is now available! This first volume spans the Prologue and Chapter 1 of Monsters and Myriads in brilliant full-color with never-before-seen new pages, panels, and edits. We're so so excited to finally share this segment of the story in a high-quality print with all the polish and love we've been dying to give these pages since we published them online.

/ WEBCOMIC
When a vial of coveted 'God Blood' gets into the hands of a highschooler, the small Wisconsin town of Shenee will never be the same. This comedic, supernatural adventure pits an unlikely group of teens against false gods, spooky monsters, and homecoming

/ WEBCOMIC
In a world where Thomas Edison discovers teleportation alongside the lightbulb and a magical race of 'Fae' mediate between human and animal, a cowboy fae recruits the last train to steal back the western storms from the Boston mob.
